description: John Spence is recognized as one of the Top 100 Business Thought Leaders in America, one of the Top 100 Small Business Influencers in America, and one of the Top 500 Leadership Development Experts in the World. John created this series of seven courses covering essential teambuilding skills created specifically for technology teams.
name: Leading Technology Teams
subtitle: Leading Technology Teams

episodes.description: This session covers the stages of team development, what type of team to create, the ideal team member model, and picking the right people for your team.
episodes.title: Launching a Successful Team

episodes.description: In this session you will understand how to start the team off on the right foot, the importance of creating a team charter, tools for having more effective meetings, and the four levels of decision-making on a team. You will also learn about the nine different team roles, how to set effective goals and the six characteristics of a high-performance team.
episodes.title: Establishing Guidelines, Roles and Goals

episodes.description: In this session you will look at why having a strong culture is so critical to the success of the team. You will also explore what top talent looks for when they join a team, the key characteristics of a winning culture, and the five dysfunctions that can kill a team.
episodes.title: Developing a Team and its Culture

episodes.description: In this section you will explore why having a highly engaged, loyal and committed team members is essential to success. You will look at how to build trust in an organization, on a personal level and as a team leader. You will also find out about how to overcome distrust and create a high level of commitment to the organization, to the team and as a team leader.
episodes.title: Building Trust and Commitment on Your Team

episodes.description: Being superb at effective communications is critical for the success of a team. In this session, you will learn how to ask great questions, the five levels of listening, positive body language, negative body language, social styles and other essential communications tools. You will also look at how to increase collaboration and five levels of conflict that inhibit team collaboration.
episodes.title: Team Communication and Collaboration

episodes.description: You will begin the session with a clear definition of motivation and how to create it for an individual. You also review social styles and how they directly impact motivation on a team, and the five most powerful areas of motivation. In the area of team optimization, you will learn about the five keys to creating accountability, the importance of frequent team meetings and teambuilding sessions and why analytical tools are essential in team optimization.
episodes.title: Motivating and Optimizing Team Performance

episodes.description: You will begin this session with looking at how much of the fundamental things about building great team also applies to virtual teams, the specific advantages of virtual teams, the challenge of virtual teams and the key steps to keeping the team motivated and collaborating together. You also look at how to run effective virtual team meetings, specifically what to do during the meeting and how to effectively lead a virtual team.
episodes.title: Managing Virtual Teams
